NF.Q: In the column Performance Ratings of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 1077? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 415 and 484? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Training Program to node Excellent and from node Average to node Phone Screen, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Average} to node {Phone Screen} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Phone Screen to node Full-time, from node Phone Screen to node Intern, and from node Final Interview to node Part-time, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Phone Screen} to node {Full-time} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Average to node Technical Interview, from node Mentorship Assignment to node Average, and from node Phone Screen to node Contractor, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Phone Screen} to node {Contractor} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Employee Types of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Mentorship Assignment to target node Contractor? Please list all node labels along this path.
